description:
Chipmunk`s rough sister Shou shows up at his house. She throws out his treasures, hits him and bullies him until he runs off. Bonobono was an innocent bystander, but ends up getting drawn in as well. But then, a voice calls out, saying "Stop that!" Chipmunk`s other sister Dai struts confidently in.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: シマリスくんのおねえさん
